title: Episode 18: Free Speech, Faith, Science, and Christians in Hollywood!
description: Free Speech + Faith = Riots? Will Science eliminate God? These questions PLUS a conversation about the portrayal Christians in Hollywood and the history of Christian art... this week on the podcast!
